right.text: He's really sweet, hon. He's just an asshole in public because it's fun. And while I disagree with it, I shrug it off because I'm at a point where it really doesn't matter anymore to me. Nothing does.

left.text: I'm actually kind of amazed you're friends with Vlad. He has a tendency to... well, be a jerk to a lot of people that don't really deserve it.

right.text: I can understand being an asshole to some extent but... I dunno. But hey, you know him much better than I do.

left.text: Hon, he told someone in #jkpj13 that they were probably either a total whore, ugly as hell, or completely desperate because they mentioned they found me attractive.

right.text: I never said that, hon. Don't put words in my mouth.

left.text: Well, then I have bad friends.
